Steps: Preheat oven to 190 degrees celsius. Place chicken breasts in a roasting tin.
Mix together the other ingredients and heat in the microwave for 1 minute until hot. Stir well and pour over the chicken.
Roast in the oven for 30 minutes, basting often. Leave to stand for 5 minutes before serving.
Place oil in a pan and heat it
When the oil is hot place your chicken in the pan
After 3 minutes of frying the chicken add the thai green curry paste to the chicken and make sure the chicken is well coated in the paste
After this add the coconut milk and green peppers to the pan and turn the heat down low to simmer
Now put the rice into boiling salted water and cook it for 10/15 minutes
When the rice is cooked everything will be ready to plate up!!
